heroes.name: npc_dota_hero_earth_spirit
heroes.bio_loc:
Deep amid the Upland crags and cliffs there runs a seam of sacred jade long foresworn by highland miners. From this rare material, the likeness of the great general Kaolin was carved and buried at the head of a stone funerary army ten thousand strong--a force of soldiers and holy men, jesters and acrobats, carved by crafstmen and entombed for millennia in the dark embrace of the Earth.

What the craftsmen had not known was that within the strange seam of jade flowed the spirit of the Earth itself--an elemental force at one with the planet. When the force within the carved jade found itself cut off from the life's blood of the world, it gathered its strength over the course of a thousand years and dug itself free and into the light. Now the great Kaolin Earth Spirit strides the Upland roads, fighting for the spirit of the Earth; and in times of need calls forth remnants of his buried army still locked in the loving embrace of the soil.
heroes.hype_loc: Earth Spirit keeps the enemy in chaos and his friends in the fight. Adapting to any battle scenario, he can send his statue remnants back and forth to damage foes, or grips an ally from the jaws of death.

facets.description_loc: Gain bonus Attack Damage when Magnetizing Stone Remnants.
facets.name: earth_spirit_resonance

facets.description_loc: Stone Remnant has a {s:bonus_AbilityCooldown}s cooldown instead of Charges and Remnants don't get destroyed by Rolling Boulder.
facets.name: earth_spirit_stepping_stone

abilities.name: earth_spirit_boulder_smash
abilities.desc_loc: Earth Spirit smashes the target enemy or ally, sending them in the direction he is facing. If Earth Spirit targets an area, he will smash the nearest unit in a %remnant_smash_radius_tooltip% radius, prioritizing Stone Remnants. The travelling unit or Remnant damages all enemy units it hits.  If an enemy is hit by a Stone Remnant, they are also slowed. Stone Remnants travel further than other units. Deals %creep_multiplier%x damage to creeps.
abilities.lore_loc: It is with the power of a mountain that Earth Spirit strikes his enemies.

abilities.name: earth_spirit_rolling_boulder
abilities.desc_loc: Earth Spirit gathers himself into a boulder and, after a %delay%s delay, rolls toward the target location, dealing %damage% + %damage_str%%% STR damage and stunning enemy units. He will stop if he collides with an enemy hero or is stunned. If he rolls over a Stone Remnant, he will travel further and faster, and stun enemies for longer.
abilities.lore_loc: Calling upon his connection to the land, the Earth Spirit draws loose stone to him, which forms a protective ball that he can use to roll short distances.
notes_loc: Rolling over a Stone Remnant will destroy the Remnant.
The boulder has a radius of 160.
facets_loc: Stone Remnants are not destroyed when rolled over, and the cooldown of Stone Remnant is refreshed when the roll is done.

abilities.name: earth_spirit_geomagnetic_grip
abilities.desc_loc: Earth Spirit pulls the target Stone Remnant. Enemies struck by the gripped target will be silenced and take damage.
abilities.lore_loc: Like calls to like. Even the minerals found in the blood and bones of living beings are not immune to the call of the Earth Spirit.
notes_loc: Will not work on a unit inside Chronosphere, Duel, or Black Hole.
Geomagnetic Grip can also target allied creeps.

abilities.name: earth_spirit_stone_caller
abilities.desc_loc: Call a Stone Remnant to the target location.  Stone Remnants have no vision and are invulnerable, and can be used with Earth Spirit's abilities.  Calling a Stone Remnant consumes a charge, which recharge over time. Gains additional charges every %hero_level_increment% hero levels.
abilities.lore_loc: Earth Spirit calls forth a remnant of his stone army, long buried with him in the dark embrace of the Earth.
abilities.shard_loc: Causes Stone Remnant to provide ground vision. Increases the amount of remnants by %shard_tooltip%.
facets_loc: Has a fixed cooldown instead of charges.

abilities.name: earth_spirit_petrify
abilities.desc_loc:
Earth Spirit temporarily enchants a hero, granting them the properties of a Stone Remnant. After a short duration the remnant shatters, releasing the hero and damaging nearby enemies. < br>
Can be cast on Stone Remnants. Has a 5 second cooldown when used that way.
Has a larger cast range when cast on an ally hero.
abilities.lore_loc: Kaolin uses the elemental power of the Earth to temporarily petrify living beings, so that they might be conscripted into his stone funerary army.
notes_loc: Earth Spirit himself can be targeted by Boulder Smash if he is enchanted.

abilities.name: earth_spirit_magnetize
abilities.desc_loc: Magnetizes units in a small nearby area, causing them to take damage for a short duration. Magnetized heroes cause nearby Stone Remnants to explode, destroying the remnant and refreshing Magnetize's duration on all nearby enemies. This process can repeat multiple times. If an enemy hero is affected by Geomagnetic Grip or Boulder Smash, all magnetized heroes share the effects.
abilities.lore_loc: At the Earth Spirit's call, the minerals in the blood and bones of his enemies rebel against the bodies they find themselves in.
facets_loc: Magnetizing a Stone Remnant gives Earth Spirit bonus attack damage for %magnetized_rocks_buff_self_duration% seconds. Does not stack.
